content:
One Medical is searching for a senior engineer to work on our Clinical Data Platform (CDP) team, which is building out our FHIR server. This person would be driving many decisions as we look to improve the developer experience, and as we explore new use cases for FHIR, such as population health management and clinical decision support.

The job posting is here:
https://www.onemedical.com/careers/all-departments/3669491/?gh_jid=3669491 or PM @Daniel Tam for further details
